statements: SELECT * FROM MarineSediments;
SELECT SedimentLocation, PollutantType FROM MarineSediments WHERE ResearcherID = 123;
SELECT * FROM MarineSediments WHERE HabitatType = 'Coral Reef';
SELECT ResearcherID, SedimentLocation, HabitatType FROM MarineSediments ORDER BY ResearcherID DESC;
SELECT MAX(PollutantConcentration) AS HighestPollutantConcentration FROM MarineSediments;
SELECT ResearcherID, SedimentLocation FROM MarineSediments WHERE PollutantType = 'Oil' ORDER BY ResearcherID, PollutantConcentration DESC

SELECT ResearcherID, SedimentLocation, PollutantType, PollutantConcentration FROM MarineSediments WHERE HabitatType = 'Coral Reef' AND PollutantConcentration > 100 ORDER BY PollutantConcentration DESC
SELECT * FROM MarineSediments WHERE PollutantType LIKE '%Mercury' ORDER BY SedimentLocation
SELECT ResearcherID, PollutantType, HabitatType FROM MarineSediments WHERE SedimentLocation IN ('North Sea', 'South Pacific') ORDER BY ResearcherID, HabitatType
SELECT DISTINCT PollutantType FROM MarineSediments WHERE ResearcherID = 3 ORDER BY PollutantType
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_specialization FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'ABC University';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marine_sediments WHERE pollutant_type = 'Oil' AND pollutant_level > 0.5;
SELECT habitat_name, AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_pollutant_level FROM marine_sediments GROUP BY habitat_name;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'Oxford University';
SELECT * FROM marine_sediments WHERE pollutant_level > 0.5;
SELECT researcher_name, research_specialization FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT institution, COUNT(*) as researcher_count FROM researchers GROUP BY institution;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM MarineHabitats ORDER BY habitat_location DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM MarineHabitats WHERE habitat_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM MarineHabitats WHERE habitat_id != 3 ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, habitat_name FROM Researchers JOIN MarineHabitats ON Researchers.researcher_id = MarineHabitats.habitat_id;

SELECT researcher_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM Researchers JOIN MarineSediments ON Researchers.researcher_id = MarineSediments.location_id WHERE pollutant_level > 100 ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM MarineHabitats WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name FROM MarineHabitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;

SELECT researcher_name, habitat_name FROM Researchers JOIN SedimentSamples ON Researchers.researcher_id = SedimentSamples.researcher_id JOIN MarineHabitats ON SedimentSamples.habitat_id = MarineHabitats.habitat_id WHERE SedimentSamples.sample_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, COUNT(sample_id) FROM MarineHabitats JOIN SedimentSamples ON MarineHabitats.habitat_id = SedimentSamples.habitat_id GROUP BY habitat_name;

SELECT pollutant_name, researcher_name, COUNT(sample_id) FROM Pollutants JOIN SedimentSamples ON Pollutants.pollutant_id = SedimentSamples.pollutant_id JOIN Researchers ON SedimentSamples.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id GROUP BY pollutant_name, researcher_name;

SELECT habitat_name, researcher_name, SUM(sediment_depth) FROM MarineHabitats JOIN SedimentSamples ON MarineHabitats.habitat_id = SedimentSamples.habitat_id JOIN Researchers ON SedimentSamples.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id GROUP BY habitat_name, researcher_name;
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_description FROM MarineHabitat ORDER BY habitat_id DESC;
SELECT pollutant_type, sample_date FROM SedimentAnalysis WHERE pollutant_level > 5.0;
SELECT researcher_name, data_description FROM Researcher JOIN ResearcherData ON Researcher.researcher_id = ResearcherData.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_description FROM MarineHabitat WHERE habitat_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, analysis_date, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM Researcher JOIN SedimentAnalysis ON Researcher.researcher_id = SedimentAnalysis.habitat_id;
SELECT researcher_name, sample_date, sample_depth, pollutant_concentration FROM Researcher JOIN SedimentSample ON Researcher.researcher_id = SedimentSample.habitat_id;
SELECT researcher_name, data_description FROM Researcher JOIN ResearcherData ON Researcher.researcher_id = ResearcherData.researcher_id;
